mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture( lecture_no, lecture_time, lecture_starttime, lecture_endtime, lecture_day, subject_no, classroom_no, user_id, semester_no ) VALUES ( #{lectureNo}, #{lectureTime}, #{lectureStarttime}, #{lectureEndtime}, #{lectureDay}, #{subjectNo}, #{classroomNo}, #{userId}, #{semesterNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no lectureNo, l.lecture_time lectureTime, l.lecture_starttime lectureStarttime, l.lecture_endtime lectureEndtime, l.lecture_day lectureDay, s.subject_no subjectNo, l.classroom_no classroomNo, u.user_id userId, e.semester_no semesterNo FROM lecture l LEFT OUTER JOIN subject s ON l.subject_no = s.subject_no LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN semester e ON l.semester_no = e.semester_no WHERE l.lecture_no =#{lectureNo}
